page.title: 16May Day in Wiltshire.
page.content: On May Day Monday everyone had a holiday. It was warm and sunny. In the afternoon at 2 o'clock there was a footall match and a netball match. The boys' football team beat the mums' team 3 goals to 0. The girls' netball team beat the dads' team 5 goals to 4. The matches were played just for fun. The dads had to play in wellingtons. They were much taller than the girls. Some of the mums had bruised legs and blistered feet afterwards. When the games were over, everyone went back to the school. You could buy refreshments_canned drinks, orange squash, crisps and sweets. There was a raffle competition, too. The PTA raised Â£26 to help buy things for the school.
